title: ECommerceConnect
author: ECommerceConnect
content: Have a wide variety of Philips products available with mercari shop I can link you to show many sales and good reviews of items. Am willing to negotiate being paid upfront for items by paypal or after taking cut of sales. Person would require access to selling on amazon or ebay usa marketplace, invoices can be provided.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: ECommerceConnect on March 07, 2023, 12:07:56 AMHave a wide variety of Philips products available with mercari shop I can link you to show many sales and good reviews of items. Am willing to negotiate being paid upfront for items by paypal or after taking cut of sales. Person would require access to selling on amazon or ebay usa marketplace, invoices can be provided.Can you please show the link to the shop so that we can check the price of your product and compare it with others? If the price on the shop is lower than eBay/amazon then we may list that on eBay/Amazon and try to sell as dropshipping there. Hope you got the point.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: The way you wrote the topic is unprofessional, you did not mention a list, you did not put a method of communication, just as the price, delivery time and shipping costs may not make your service desirable and you did not update the topic..Quote from: shasan on March 18, 2023, 01:10:14 AMCan you please show the link to the shop so that we can check the price of your product and compare it with others? If the price on the shop is lower than eBay/amazon then we may list that on eBay/Amazon and try to sell as dropshipping there. Hope you got the point.The user has not logged in for several days, and he has not left another way to communicate, so I do not think he can answer your question.
